casebody.data:
Christian G. PLASMAN, in his individual capacity and derivatively for the benefit of, on behalf of and right of nominal party Bolier & Company, LLC, Plaintiff,
v.
DECCA FURNITURE (USA), INC., Decca Contract Furniture, LLC, Richard Herbst, Wai Theng Tin, Tsang C. Hung, Decca Furniture, Ltd., Decca Hospitality Furnishings, LLC, Dongguan Decca Furniture Co. Ltd., Darren Hudgins, Decca Home, LLC, and Elan by Decca, LLC, Defendants,
and
Bolier & Company, LLC, Nominal Defendant,
v.
Christian J. Plasman a/k/a Barrett Plasman, Third-party Defendant. No. COA17-358 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: November 21, 2017

DISMISSED.
